Scopronok


Scopronok fires a missle at Dracona chest. "Computer, please Reconise 
Dracona as a enemy. Ohh and tell Darkmouse to get in here." 

Computer:Affirmative.

The autoguns start firing at Dracona. 


   (There are only four people that can order the autoguns to stop 
firing, Megatron, QuickStrike, Scorponok, and Darkmouse. Note this is 
not moding, Scorponok has hire rank over everybody else.)
